MRM.AX.summary: MMA Offshore Limited provides marine logistics and marine services to the offshore oil and gas industry in Australia and internationally. The company offers offshore services, including offtake support; supply operations support; construction support; seismic and survey support; tug and barge operations; anchor handling and towing; and accommodation support services. It also provides subsea services, such as dive and ROV, and installation support, as well as inspection, maintenance, and repair services; onshore services comprising engineering and technical management, new build and vessel modification, and marine manning services; and project logistics services, as well as operates onshore facilities. It owns and operates a fleet of approximately 30 offshore vessels. The company was formerly known as Mermaid Marine Australia Limited and changed its name to MMA Offshore Limited in December 2014. MMA Offshore Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Welshpool, Australia.
